org.jcvlib.image

Class Misc

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvlib.image.Misc

  • public class Misc
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains miscellaneous image processing methods.
    Author:
    Dmitriy Zavodnikov (d.zavodnikov@gmail.com)

    • Method Detail

      • floodFill

        public static FloodFillStruct floodFill(Image image,
                        Point seed,
                        double distance,
                        Color fillColor,
                        int directionType,
                        int rangeType)
        Flood fill algorithm for fill some region.

        This region is detected by start position and distance between color of start point and neighbors of this point.

        Parameters:
        image - Source image.
        seed - Start point.
        distance - Distance between start color and color all others neighbor points. Uses for compare Euclidean distance between two pixels. Maximum value for image with 3 channels is 442.
        fillColor - Fill color value.
        directionType - Type of direction: 4 or 8 (for more details see Flood fill algorithm description on Wikipedia). See Misc.DIRECTIONS_TYPE_*.
        rangeType - Define how to calculate difference: calculate difference between the current pixel and seed pixel or difference between neighbor pixels (i.e. the range is floating).
        Returns:
        Number of filled pixels.

      • floodFill

        public static FloodFillStruct floodFill(Image image,
                        Point seed,
                        double distance,
                        Color fillColor)
        Flood fill algorithm for fill some region.

        This region is detected by start position and distance between color of start point and neighbors of this point. As default direction type uses DIRECTIONS_TYPE_8, as range type uses FLOOD_FILL_RANGE_FIXED.

        Parameters:
        image - Source image.
        seed - Start point.
        distance - Distance between start color and color all others neighbor points. Uses for compare Euclidean distance between two pixels.
        fillColor - Fill color value.
        Returns:
        Number of filled pixels.

      • integralImage

        public static Image integralImage(Image image)
        Calculate Integral image (summed area table).

        To get real sum of values you need multiply getting value to number of pixels into image! For example: 

         
 // Image image = ...
 Image intImg = Filters.integralImage(image);
 ...
 // int x = ...
 // int y = ...
 // int channel = ...
 double sumVal = intImg.get(x, y, channel) * intImg.getSize().getN();

      • buildPyramid

        public static java.util.List<Image> buildPyramid(Image image,
                                 Size minSize)
        Constructs the Gaussian pyramid for an image.
        Parameters:
        image - Source image.
        minSize - Minimum image size into created pyramid.
        Returns:
        Pyramid of images.

      • buildPyramid

        public static java.util.List<Image> buildPyramid(Image image)
        Constructs the Gaussian pyramid for an image.

        Use size [8x8] as default minimal image size value.

        Parameters:
        image - Source image.
        Returns:
        Pyramid of images.

      • injectImage

        public static Image injectImage(Image baseImage,
                Point injectPosition,
                Image injectImage)
        Put one image to another (using Alpha channel). The images must have the same channels size. The last channel uses as Alpha channel.

        Links:
        1. Alpha channel.

        Parameters:
        baseImage - This image will be changed. This image should have 3 or 4 channels!
        injectPosition - Position where will be injected injectImage on baseImage.
        injectImage - This image injected to baseImage image. This image should have 3 or 4 channels!
        Returns:
        Image with combination of baseImage and injectImage. That image have same size and type as baseImage and have 3 channels.

      • sum

        public static Image sum(Image image1,
        Image image2)
        This method sum 2 given images. Analog union for binary images and sets.

        If value of color will be more than Color.COLOR_MAX_VALUE this color value set Color.COLOR_MAX_VALUE.

        Links:
        1. Union (set theory) -- Wikipedia.

      • absDiff

        public static Image absDiff(Image image1,
            Image image2)
        Absolute value of difference between 2 images.

      • minus

        public static Image minus(Image image1,
          Image image2)
        First image minus second image. Analog complement for sets.

        If value of color will be less than Color.COLOR_MIN_VALUE this color value set Color.COLOR_MIN_VALUE.

        Links:
        1. Complement (set theory) -- Wikipedia.

      • getMean

        public static Color getMean(Image image)
        Return arithmetic mean of colors in current image.

        Links:
        1. Arithmetic mean -- Wikipedia.
